org.eclipse.smarthome.io.transport.serial

Interface SerialPortEvent


  • @NonNullByDefault
public interface SerialPortEvent
    Interface for a serial port event.
    Author:
    Markus Rathgeb - Initial contribution

    • Method Detail

      • getEventType

        int getEventType()
        Get the type of the event.
        Returns:
        the event type

      • getNewValue

        boolean getNewValue()
        Gets the new value of the state change that caused the SerialPortEvent to be propagated. For example, when the CD bit changes, newValue reflects the new value of the CD bit.
